import { FaFacebookF, FaInstagram } from "react-icons/fa"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; export default function Footer() { const scrollToTop = () => window.scrollTo({ top: 0, behavior: "smooth" }); return (
{/* Top row: logo + nav + socials */}
{/* Logo / brand */} Shaila Bakes {/* Quick nav links */}
{[ { name: "Home", path: "/" }, { name: "Cakes and Classes", path: "/cakes-and-classes" }, { name: "Enquiry", path: "/enquiry" }, { name: "Contact", path: "/contact" }, { name: "About", path: "/about" }, ].map(({ name, path }) => ( {name} ))}
{/* Social icons */}
{/* Optional newsletter or contact placeholder */} {/*

Subscribe to our newsletter

*/} {/* Divider */}
{/* Bottom row: copyright + back to top */}

© {new Date().getFullYear()} Shaila Bakes . All rights reserved.

); }
